name: FileEase
description: FileEase is a file manager that has file browsing, bookmarking and custom directory creation features. Built using Python and PyQT6 framework, FileEase offers lightweight and self-explanatory features to manage your local files.

name: TravelDot
description: TravelDot is a travel bookings and reservation site that allows users to search, book and manage their travel plans. Users can comprehensively search for flights, hotels and car rentals.

name: WeatherLite
description: WeatherLite is a lightweight weather app that provides real-time weather information. Users can search for weather information by city name and view the current weather, temperature, humidity and wind speed.

name: Portfolio
description: Portfolio is a personal portfolio website that showcases my projects, skills and experiences. The website is built using React and Tailwind CSS.

name: CurrencyConverter
description: CurrencyConverter is a currency conversion app that allows users to convert between different currencies. Users can search for currency rates and convert between different currencies.
